    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Overrides the equals method of the Object class to check if this object is equal to another object. If the object being compared is a Matrix, it delegates the comparison to the Matrix.equals() method. Otherwise, it throws an InvalidParameterException.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be compared for equality with this object
      Returns:
      true if the objects are equal, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if the obj parameter is not of type Matrix

    • allZeroes

      public static Matrix allZeroes(int row, int col)
      Creates a new Matrix object of a given size with all values initialized to zero
      Parameters:

      col - The number of columns in the new matrix
      Returns:

      public static Matrix identityMatrix(int size)
      Creates a new square Matrix object of a given size that is the identity matrix
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • ref

      public static Matrix ref(Matrix A)
      Calculates the row echelon form of a given matrix. A new copy of the input matrix is created and modified; the original matrix is left untouched.
      Parameters:
      A - the input matrix to calculate the row echelon form of
      Returns:
      a new matrix object containing the row echelon form of the input matrix

    • inverse

      public static Matrix inverse(Matrix A)
      Calculates the inverse of a square matrix A.
      Parameters:
      A - the input square matrix to calculate the inverse of
      Returns:
      the inverse matrix of the input square matrix
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if the input matrix is not square
